Entries.Shane1: @... My head's spinning, but it's not from any booze.

Entries.summer_Shane: What's on my agenda today... hmmm... #$e#I think I see some spicy pretzel snacks and a tub of ice cream on the horizon.
Entries.spouseRoom_Shane: #$c .5#Should I watch a movie or play video games? Sometimes life can be challenging.#$e#Hi, @. I'll just hang out in here today and uh... maybe sweep the floor a little bit or something.

Entries.FlowerDance_Accept_Spouse: Dance? Hoo-boy. Okay... I can't promise I won't accidentally step on your foot...

Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Here... take this.[206 174 903 305 215]#$e#I bought some of those a while ago and they're almost expired...
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: I'm just gonna have a little extra dessert before closing my eyes for the night.
Entries.Neutral_6: If you need to go see your friends in town, go ahead. I'm happy in the company of the TV and a couple of microwave pretzels.
Entries.spring_1: Ooo... my throbbing head. I definitely didn't drink enough water yesterday to balance out the soda.
Entries.summer_27: What are your plans for the fall? I'm going to try and incorporate more veggies into my diet.
Entries.fall_1: Hmm... I might have to buy a few cases of sparkling pumpkin cider to celebrate the season...$6

Entries.marriage_Fri.002: If I don't order a fancy soda every once in a while, Gus will go out of business. I'm just doing my civic duty. I'll head home around 10.
